promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young basic squid water-type pokemon with a ornate crystal core. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or squid. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystaquid, a a chibi young basic squid water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Frog Hop. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "squid", "water" or "Crystaquid". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, squid-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Navigating fresh stream habitats, the playful Crystaquid relies on Frog Hop to leap upstream. This petite cephalopod sparkles in the morning light.
